types.name: Memory
types.docstring:
`Memory` represents memory allocated by (and shared with) the host.
 TODO: What kind of error checking needs to happen here?

methods.name: allocate
methods.docstring:
`Memory::allocate` allocates an uninitialized (determined by host)
 area of shared memory on the host.

methods.name: allocate_bytes
methods.docstring:
`Memory::allocate_bytes` allocates and initializes host memory
 with the provided (unprocessed) bytes.

methods.name: allocate_json_value
methods.docstring:
`Memory::allocate_json_value` allocates and initializes a UTF-8 string
 in host memory that is converted from this `Json`.

methods.name: allocate_string
methods.docstring:
`Memory::allocate_string` allocates and initializes a UTF-8 string
 in host memory that is converted from this UTF-16 MoonBit String.

methods.name: free
methods.docstring: `free` releases this Memory from the host.

methods.name: output_memory
methods.docstring: `output_memory` sets the host's "output" to be the contents of this Memory data.

methods.name: to_bytes
methods.docstring:
`to_bytes` reads the (unprocessed) bytes residing in the host memory
 to a MoonBit Bytes.

methods.name: to_int
methods.docstring:
`to_int` reads and converts the u32 residing in the host memory
 to a MoonBit Int.

methods.name: to_string
methods.docstring:
`to_string` reads and converts the UTF-8 string residing in the host memory
 to a UTF-16 MoonBit String.

values.name: find_memory
values.docstring: `find_memory` returns a `Memory` struct from an offset provided by the host.

values.name: input
values.docstring: `input` returns a sequence of (unprocessed) bytes from the host.

values.name: input_string
values.docstring: `input_string` returns a (UTF-16) String from the host.

values.name: log_debug_str
values.docstring: `log_debug_str` is a helper function to log a debug string to the host.

values.name: log_error_str
values.docstring: `log_error_str` is a helper function to log an error string to the host.

values.name: log_info_str
values.docstring: `log_info_str` is a helper function to log an info string to the host.

values.name: log_warn_str
values.docstring: `log_warn_str` is a helper function to log a warn string to the host.

values.name: output
values.docstring: `output` sends a sequence of (unprocessed) bytes to the host as the plugin's "output".

values.name: output_json_value
values.docstring:
`output_json_value` converts a MoonBit `Json` to an Extism JSON string
 and sends it to the host.

values.name: output_string
values.docstring:
`output_string` converts a MoonBit String (UTF-16) to an Extism string (UTF-8)
 and sends it to the host.

values.name: set_error
values.docstring:
`set_error` converts a MoonBit String (UTF-16) to an Extism string (UTF-8)
 and sends it to the host as its error output.
